mapper.select: SELECT board.boardTitle, board.boardProPrice, location.locationName, kategory.kategoryName, state.stateName, board.boardHitCnt,board.boardLike, board.boardContents,board.boardUserId, board.boardNum, file.filePath, file.fileBoardNum FROM board LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM file GROUP BY file.fileBoardNum) file ON board.boardNum = file.fileBoardNum JOIN location location ON location.locationNum = board.boardUserCheck JOIN kategory kategory ON kategory.kategoryNum = board.boardKategory JOIN state state ON board.boardProState = state.stateNum WHERE board.deleted_yn='N' and board.boardType='p' ORDER BY board.boardNum desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (boardTitle, boardKategory, boardUserId, boardContents, boardDate, boardProPrice, boardType) values(#{boardTitle},#{boardKategory},#{boardUserId},#{boardContents},now(),#{boardProPrice},'p')
INSERT into map (mapBoardNum, mapX, mapY) VALUES (#{boardNum}, #{mapX}, #{mapY});
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT board.boardTitle, board.boardProPrice, location.locationName, kategory.kategoryName, state.stateName, board.boardHitCnt,board.boardLike, board.boardContents,board.boardUserId, board.boardNum, board.boardDate, user.userManner,file.filePath, map.mapX,map.mapY FROM board board JOIN location location ON location.locationNum = board.boardUserCheck JOIN kategory kategory ON kategory.kategoryNum = board.boardKategory JOIN file file ON file.fileBoardNum = board.boardNum JOIN state state ON board.boardProState = state.stateNum JOIN user user ON board.boardUserId = user.userId JOIN map map on board.boardNum = map.mapBoardNum WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum} AND board.deleted_yn='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET boardHitCnt = boardHitCnt + 1 WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
UPDATE board set boardTitle=#{boardTitle},boardContents = #{boardContents},boardProState = #{boardProState} where boardNum = #{boardNum}
UPDATE board set deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: select userAdd2 from user where userId = #{userId}
